~~~ INPUT ~~~
<html>
   <head>
     <script>
        function someFunction() {
            for(var i = 2; i < 5; i++){
                // do something smart
            }
        }
     </script>

   </head>
</html>
~~~ TITLE ~~~

~~~ PROPERTIES ~~~

~~~ HEAD ~~~

     <script>
        function someFunction() {
            for(var i = 2; i < 5; i++){
                // do something smart
            }
        }
     </script>

~~~ BODY ~~~
<html>
   
</html>
